snippet: Mr. Cencic, a countertenor accompanied by this ensemble, sang arias in Italian during a program featuring selections by composers associated with Naples.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of baroque arias performed by countertenor Max Emanuel Cencic at Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cencic, a countertenor accompanied by this ensemble, sang arias in Italian during a program featuring selections by composers associated with Naples.

headline.main: Review: Max Emanuel Cencic and Il Pomo D’Oro Bring Baroque to the Met
headline.print_headline: A Vocalist Interprets the Obscure With an Assist From Period Instruments
